name: LocalServerConfig
documentation:
Configuration for the local HTTP server used to handle {@code WebRequest} messages outside of Fluxzero's own web handling framework.

This configuration is primarily intended for users who prefer to delegate web request handling to a custom or third-party locally running HTTP server (e.g., Spring MVC, Javalin, etc.) instead of the built-in Fluxzero web stack.

Note: This feature is not commonly used and may be deprecated or removed in future versions.

fields.name: ignore404
fields.documentation:
Whether to ignore 404 (Not Found) responses for unmatched requests.

If {@code true}, 404s returned by the local server will be ignored by the dispatcher. Defaults to {@code true}.

fields.name: port
fields.documentation:
The port number on which the local server should listen.

Required to forward web requests to the external server.
